means: 劝（某人）勿做某事，劝阻( dissuade的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: If he has once fastened upon an idea, there is no dissuading him from it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一旦认准一个主意, 就不可能让他放弃.

list.abs: mother dissuaded her from leaving home .母亲劝她不要离家出走。
they dissuaded her from going on the stage .他们劝她不要去演戏。
Instead it would drain your energy and dissuade you ., 相反 , 它会消耗你的能量和劝阻你.
How can I dissuade you from making such a decision ?, 我怎么才能说服您不做出这种决定呢?
dissonant 不谐和的dissuade from 劝止某人做dissuade 劝阻

entry.tran: 劝阻;劝(某人)不要做(或相信)
entry.def: If you dissuade someone from doing or believing something, you persuade them not to do or believe it.

example.ex: Doctors had tried to dissuade patients from smoking...
example.tran: 医生们劝病人不要吸烟。

example.ex: She steadfastly maintained that her grandsons were innocent, and nothing could dissuade her from that belief...
example.tran: 她坚持认为她孙子是无辜的，什么都不能改变她这一看法。

auth_sentence.content: I've grown used to dissuading them from seeking their own kind of justice.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've grown used to dissuading them from seeking their own kind of justice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've grown used to dissuading them from seeking their own kind of justice.

auth_sentence.content: Soaring levels of pollution are driving expatriates out of Chinese cities, and dissuading others from coming.
auth_sentence.res_content: Soaring levels of pollution are driving expatriates out of Chinese cities, and dissuading others from coming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Soaring levels of pollution are driving expatriates out of Chinese cities, and dissuading others from coming.

auth_sentence.content: Essential though these developments are to encouraging cycling and dissuading car users, they only form part of the solution.
auth_sentence.res_content: Essential though these developments are to encouraging cycling and dissuading car users, they only form part of the solution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Essential though these developments are to encouraging cycling and dissuading car users, they only form part of the solution.
